title: If I Were In Charge
description: In If I Were in Charge, Helga, an elementary student, is asked by her teacher to come up with rules for the school if she were in charge. Helga excitedly presents her rules to her class, but her class does not feel the same about her rules as she does. This book provides the opportunity to introduce analyzing characters while lively pictures support emergent readers.
